protocol_name: Do an EXAHD GENE run on hazel hen
protocol_name_html: Do an EXAHD GENE run on hazel hen
status_info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"dhdkt","text":"Define a scenario (or more that belong together) and push it as a parameters file into https:\/\/simsgs.informatik.uni-stuttgart.de:8444\/EXAHD\/ParameterFiles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":87,"length":68,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"evr40","text":"(for the combigrid runs, we'll need ctparam files there, too)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"65lk1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cmhgm","text":"Create an issue to have other people have a look at it and so we can guide it through our project board: https:\/\/simsgs.informatik.uni-stuttgart.de:8444\/EXAHD\/ParameterFiles\/boards","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":105,"length":75,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"cvk9h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1j26k","text":"Add label 1 to the issue once you have completed this step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https:\/\/simsgs.informatik.uni-stuttgart.de:8444\/EXAHD\/ParameterFiles"}},{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"url":"https:\/\/simsgs.informatik.uni-stuttgart.de:8444\/EXAHD\/ParameterFiles\/boards"}}],"guid":"AB2ABD50DC4111E8B22D015F274AE0BA","id":678222,"previous_guid":null,"section":"Fix parameters, upload and create issue"}

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"7qbc8","text":"Depends on the scenario, and what we want to find out.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bf4vt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2fvh7","text":"For instance, get the files onto draco and run GENE diagnostics there (Tilman can help with that).
